member.name: T:MahJong.ThrowFireballCommand
member.summary: Future Command Dash/Throw Fireball [Spacebar or B Button]

member.name: T:MahJong.PauseCommand
member.summary: Future Command Pause [[Pp] or Start Button]

member.name: T:MahJong.MarioGame
member.summary: This is the main type for your game.

member.name: M:MahJong.MarioGame.Initialize
member.summary: Allows the game to perform any initialization it needs to before starting to run. This is where it can query for any required services and load any non-graphic related content. Calling base.Initialize will enumerate through any components and initialize them as well.

member.name: M:MahJong.MarioGame.LoadContent
member.summary: LoadContent will be called once per game and is the place to load all of your content.

member.name: M:MahJong.MarioGame.UnloadContent
member.summary: UnloadContent will be called once per game and is the place to unload game-specific content.

member.name: M:MahJong.MarioGame.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Allows the game to run logic such as updating the world, checking for collisions, gathering input, and playing audio.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.

member.name: M:MahJong.MarioGame.Draw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: This is called when the game should draw itself.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.

member.name: M:MahJong.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
